solution_line_template: On Monday and Tuesday Bart finished {monday_surveys} + {tuesday_surveys} = <<{monday_surveys}+{tuesday_surveys}={total_surveys}>>{total_surveys} surveys.
Each survey has {questions_per_survey} questions, so he answered {questions_per_survey} * {total_surveys} = <<{questions_per_survey}*{total_surveys}={total_questions}>>{total_questions} questions.
Bart gets paid ${pay_per_question} for each questions, so he earned {total_questions} * ${pay_per_question} = $<<{total_questions}*{pay_per_question}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
